title: Waterfall Model
subject: Software Engineering
theory:
Classic linear model. 
Req -> Design -> Code -> Test -> Deploy. 
**Pros**: Simple, Easy to manage. 
**Cons**: Rigid. Cannot go back. Working software comes at END. 
Best for: Small projects with fixed requirements.

common_mistakes.correction: Startup requirements change daily. Waterfall will fail. Use Agile.

interview_questions.question: When to use Waterfall?
interview_questions.answer: When requirements are clear, fixed, and technology is well understood.

real_world_use_cases.description: Specs are fixed for years. Safety critical.
